name: Meteor Magnet Miner
description:
(This game won first place in Tinyjam 2018!)

In the far future Earth is running dangerously low on magnezite, a very important element for our civilization's technological needs. Luckily, magnezite ore is abundant in a nearby asteroid cloud. 

You must fly the USS Oersted, a specialized magnetic mining craft, to collect as much magnezite as possible and return it to Earth.

Controls

Press the blue button in the lower right-hand corner to play in fullscreen (highly recommended)

Up arrow or W to activate ship's thrusters

Left and right arrows (or A and D) to turn the ship left and right

Space bar will temporarily demagnetize your ship, causing your collected magnezite to detach itself from your craft. 

Scoring

Fly close to any magnezite ore (the small red ones) and it'll start orbiting your craft.

While hovering over Earth, press Space to deposit any magnezite orbiting around your craft. 

Don't forget to press Space again to turn the magnetism back on after the cooldown's recharged. 

Developers

Programming - Aidan Kennell and James Morrow

Art - Miguel Mercado

Sound design - James Zolyak

Concept & design - aabicus
